Veratis sits down watching the monitors, his daughter hadn't reported 
in, Foxfingers last report said he'd found a maximal ship, and 
Lunarpine still wasn't back with the necessary DNA. Shadow Wings body 
had begun to take shape, just not the shape it was supposed to. He'd 
slowed down the progress of the assimilation but he couldn't figure 
out how it had taken hold to begin with. He was worried. a power 
surge seemed to have weakened her to the point where he couldn't make 
contact. All he could do now was sit back and watch.



Meanwhile onboard the CF Foxfingers studies the room he'd just broken 
into. He switched his optics over to night vision and scanned the 
room for alarms. none were found inside the room. "Maybe I'll just 
take one quick peak to see what I would've gotten if I was really 
trying to steal from them. He transformed to Fox to avoid the 
cameras. "Maybe just one momento of my visit. Foxfingers took a 
grenade and placed it into his pouch. then an energeon charge, and a 
detonator, and some power cells, and....
